item.title: Mentioned by SooToday.com
item.description:
NDP says invest in Northern economy, not the Senate (photo)
Pictured, from left to right, are NDP Northern Ontario Caucus Chair and Sudbury MP Glenn Thibeault, Thunder Bay-Rainy River MP John Rafferty and Algoma-Manitoulin-Kapuskasing MP Carol Hughes. The trio spoke to reporters Thursday afternoon while on ...

item.title: Mentioned by KenoraOnline
item.description:
Rafferty hopes to have mediator appointed
Thunder Bay - Rainy River MP John Rafferty is hoping to improve negotiations, in an effort to save the Treaty Three Police Service. He says he's been talking with Parliamentary secretary for public safety Candice Hoeppner to appoint a mediator.

item.description:
Happy Canada Day - John Rafferty MP
John Rafferty is the current Member of Parliament for Thunder Bay – Rainy River and a member of the New Democratic Party caucus in the House of Commons in Ottawa, Ontario. John was first elected to serve as MP in the 2008 federal election and was ...
